name: The Weird Cat
description:
NOT RECOMMENDED FOR MOBILE (since they cant press space and stuff)

It's a kind of loud clicking game, the cat can also walk around.

Made in a decent spand of time and i'm proud of it lol.

-------------------------------------------

Test these words when pressing space:

youre kinda weird

ur cute

n

NOOB

-------------------------------------------

Controls:

up arrow: move up

left arrow: move left

right arrow: move right

down arrow: move down
